answers.answer: Wow, she really IS overweight.  The little girl needs a serious diet and exercise routine!Yes, you should be concerned about excessive thirst.  There are several things that could be happening.  You are right to look into diabetes, but it could also be a bladder/ kidney/ urinary tract problem - or something else entirely.  It's time to check in with your vet and get to the bottom of what's happening.  And don't forget to post back and let us know how she's doing.  :-)

question: Is  it  common  for  my  toy  chihuahua age 7  to  be  thirsty  all  the  time she  is  over  weight but seems  to  be  ok
title: diabetic
